subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Memphis edged Texas-El Paso, 67-66, in the final of the Conference USA tournament Saturday in El Paso, when Joe Jackson made two free throws with seven seconds left.
snippet: Memphis edged Texas-El Paso, 67-66, in the final of the Conference USA tournament Saturday in El Paso, when Joe Jackson made two free throws with seven seconds left.
